name: Konohagakure
startIntroPart1: Established by Hashirama Senju and Madara Uchiha after the Warring States Period, Konoha became the first hidden village and model for all others. Its founding birthed the modern ninja system, replacing clan warfare with collective defense.
uniqueText: Its strength lies not in walls or weapons, but in generations of shinobi who turned a dream of peace into reality through sacrifice, forgiveness, and undying hope.
declaringWar: Whenever you live, there will always be war.
defeated: Remember to protect the people that are precious to you.
attacked: To know what is right and choose to ignore it is the act of a coward.
tradeRequest: In the futureâ€¦ I dream of a time when all shinobi will cooperate with each other.
